description: Rotherham make it three wins out of three under Matt Hamshaw as Sam Nombe's first-half strike earns them a smash-and-grab win at Bolton.
title: Bolton Wanderers 0-1 Rotherham United
title_page: Bolton Wanderers 0-1 Rotherham United - BBC Sport
maintext:
Bolton Wanderers have won four of their last five home league games against Rotherham United (L1), scoring 2+ goals in each of those victories.
Rotherham United have won each of their last four league games against Bolton Wanderers, netting 3.3 goals-per-game on average during that time.
Since the start of 2019-20, Bolton have only lost three of their 31 home league games played on a Tuesday (W20 D8), winning eight of their last 10 such games (D1 L1).
